markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 594 4.0 **Price** 425 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- This simple iron staff is capped with a faceted, clear gem.
  • **Cantrip** [_light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=171)
  • **2nd** [_continual flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=50)
  • **3rd** _continual flame_, [_searing light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=269)
**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
name: Staff of Illumination
